generic.no_more_results: You have reached the end of the list

error.generic_desc: Please try again later or contact your PartyHall administrator

401.title: Authentication expired
401.message:
This should not have happened.
Refresh or logout should have been called

403.title: Forbidden
403.message: You do not have permission to access this resource.

404.title: Page lost in space
404.message:
The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
Maybe it got lost in another galaxy?

5xx.title: Server error
5xx.message:
An unexpected error occurred on the server.
Please try again later.

login.title: Login
login.register_prompt: Don't have an account? Register here.

events.title: Events
events.notice_id_appliance: Note: If the event was created manually, the id is to be filled on every appliance participating to the event.

participants.add_disclaimer: Are you sure you want to add {{username}} to this event?
participants.remove_disclaimer: Are you sure you want to remove {{username}} from this event?

karaoke.title: Sung songs
karaoke.no_sessions: No sung songs for this event!

settings.title: Settings
settings.conclude_description: Mark this event as over. It will no longer be editable, the timelapse generation will be launched, and users will be able to download a zip file containing everything related to the event. Do this once the event is over and the appliance has fully synchronized with PartyNexus.
settings.conclude_confirm_desc: You are going to conclude the event '{{eventName}}'. Be careful as once this is done, the event will not be able to receive new pictures or do anything new. Please ensure your appliance has properly synchronized everything !
settings.concluded_no_export: Event is over but no export has been generated yet. Please wait a bit!

display_board.title: Display board
display_board.desc: A display board generates a link that you can put on a screen next to the appliance to show the last 9 pictures taken.
display_board.no_key: No link were generated yet for this event.

export.title: Export infos
export.force_reexport_desc: You are going to re-export this event, which will delete the old export and create a new one. This may take some time.

my_appliances.title: My appliances
my_appliances.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the appliance '{{name}}'?

change_password.title: Change password
change_password.password_mismatch: New password and confirmation do not match

ban.title: Ban user
ban.desc: Banning a user will prevent them from logging in to PartyNexus.

magic_password.title: Magic password
magic_password.desc: A MagicPassword is a link that you can give to someone so that they can define a password without having to login. It is single-use and let the person use the app when mails are poorly configured (Not received, falls in spam, etc...). This can also be used as a "Forgotten password" feature.

auth_log.title: Authentication logs
auth_log.empty: No authentication logs found for this user

backdrop_albums.title: Backdrop albums
backdrop_albums.author: Album author
backdrop_albums.note_appliance_update: Note: The appliance will only update whenever the album version is updated. Do all the update you want then increment the version number.

delete_confirm.title: Delete album
delete_confirm.desc: Are you sure you want to delete the album '{{title}}'? This will remove it from all appliances that fetched it.

backdrops.title: Backdrops
backdrops.delete_desc: Are you sure you want to delete the backdrop '{{title}}'?

compile.title: Compilation settings
compile.text1: A song can be either uncompiled (extracted, ready to be edited) or compiled (a .phk file is generated and edition is locked).
compile.text2: Here you can request to compile / decompile your song
compile.text3: Note that decompiling the song will remove it from all the appliances that fetched it, and rebuilding it will cause the appliance to fetch it again.

failure_compile.title: Failed to compile
failure_compile.description: The song was not compiled. Look at the console for more infos

failure_decompile.title: Failed to decompile
failure_decompile.description: The song was not decompiled. Look at the console for more infos
